definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to tell fox ghost stories around a bonfire and incite rebellion/an uprising is afoot (idiom)

sentences.english: This doesn’t, ofcourse, mean that Firefox is facing a bleak future.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这并不意味着火狐的前景将会一片凄凉。

sentences.english: In addition, enterprise user is red fox most hard all-pervading user group.
sentences.chinese: 此外，企业用户是火狐最难以普及的用户群。

sentences.english: I hope these shortcuts will enhance your browsing productivity with Firefox .
sentences.chinese: 我希望这些快捷键可以提高你用火狐冲浪的浏览效率。

sentences.english: It's a Firefox add-on, and it's magical.
sentences.chinese: 它可是一款奇妙的火狐插件。

sentences.english: Nevertheless red fox still expresses, bilateral collaboration is insusceptible.
sentences.chinese: 不过火狐仍表示，双方的合作不受影响。

sentences.english: By default, Firefox 3automatically scan the downloaded file with the default anti-virusapplication to make sure it is free of virus.
sentences.chinese: 火狐3默认在你下载文件后会自动调用杀毒程序杀毒。

sentences.english: You can use this to navigate directly to the browser address bar of firefox.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用该快捷键直接把光标转到火狐的地址栏。

sentences.english: On a curious note, my Firefox homepage was set to Google.
sentences.chinese: 我本人也很好奇，我的火狐默认主页设置的是谷歌。

sentences.english: By default, Firefox 3 caches 500MB of data from supportedoffline Web apps.
sentences.chinese: 火狐3默认只有500mb的离线缓存。

sentences.english: It seems like some of them are remakes, such as Star Fox.
sentences.chinese: 看起来好像有一些是重制的，像是《星际火狐》？

sentences.english: And there's a new Firefox add-on from Google to help people translate the Web more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 而且谷歌上有新的火狐插件，可以上翻译更快捷。

sentences.english: For that reason, I can't say that IE8 dethrones my previous browser champ, Firefox.
sentences.chinese: 因为这个原因，IE8未能取代火狐成为我的最爱。

sentences.english: However, the vast number of extensions available for Firefox can be a bit overwhelming.
sentences.chinese: 然而，多如牛毛的火狐扩展会让用户感到无所适从。

sentences.english: Remember Password when prompt from the Firefox Password Manager.
sentences.chinese: 在火狐密码管理器提示时，选择记住密码。

sentences.english: Foxfire is a 25 year-old woman who patrols the streets of Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 出没于密西根的街道的火狐是一名25岁的女性。

sentences.english: Firefox is configured to use a proxy server that is refusing connections.
sentences.chinese: 火狐被拒绝连接到正在连接的服务器。

definition: civet (arboreal cat)/viverrid (mammal group including mongoose and civet)
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
